articles.title: Kevin Durant gets tech for shoving Nikola Jokic in sideline confrontation - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Kevin Durant was called for a technical foul after shoving Nikola Jokic out of the way when the Nuggets superstar attempted to infiltrate an impromptu Suns huddle during Game 5 of the Western Conference semifinal series.
articles.content:
DENVER -- Nuggets superstar Nikola Jokic was involved in another feisty sideline confrontation Tuesday night, but this time he was on the receiving end of a shove, from Suns superstar Kevin Durant.
